senses.de: To find out what illness someone has, or what is causing a fault in a machine or system, after doing tests, examinations, etc.
senses.ex: The mechanic diagnosed the car as having a faulty brake system.

Tips.title: Medical Precision
Tips.description: Used in healthcare to identify specific illnesses or conditions with accuracy.
Tips.example: The doctor diagnosed her with early-stage arthritis.

Tips.title: Technical Troubleshooting
Tips.description: Applied in mechanical or technical fields to find the cause of a malfunction.
Tips.example: The engineer diagnosed the bridge collapse as a structural failure.

Tips.title: Analytical Process
Tips.description: Involves a systematic process of testing and examination to reach a diagnosis.
Tips.example: The specialist diagnosed the software issue after several debugging steps.

senses.de: To describe something accurately and say what its characteristics or symptoms are.
senses.ex: The economist diagnosed the current financial situation as a result of poor legislation.

Tips.title: Detailed Description
Tips.description: Used to provide a deep understanding of a subject by describing its features or behavior.
Tips.example: She diagnosed the problems in the community with great detail.

Tips.title: Observational Insight
Tips.description: Requires careful observation to analyze the characteristics of a particular issue or case.
Tips.example: The consultant diagnosed the failure of the project to be due to poor management.

Tips.title: Non-Medical Contexts
Tips.description: Broadens the use of 'diagnose' beyond health, applying to economics, politics, etc.
Tips.example: Analysts have diagnosed the economic downturn as a consequence of trade imbalances.

Ascertain.wordDefinition:
Ascertain means to find out or determine something through investigation or research. For example, you can ascertain the cause of a problem by looking at the facts and evidence.

Ascertain is applicable when you are trying to determine the cause of a problem or uncovering facts, whereas diagnose is applicable when identifying a specific medical condition or ailment.

Detect.wordDefinition:
Detect means to discover or notice something, while diagnose means to identify the specific problem or condition that is causing certain symptoms or issues.

For example, if a doctor notices that a patient has a fever, they have detected the fever. But to diagnose the underlying cause of the fever, the doctor needs to conduct further tests and analysis to identify the specific illness or infection causing the fever.

Detect is used more broadly to refer to noticing or discovering something, while diagnose is used more specifically in the medical context to identify the cause of a health issue.

Determine.wordDefinition:
Determine means to find out or decide something through investigation or analysis.

Determine is used to find an answer to a question or problem, while diagnose is used to identify a medical condition.

Figure out.wordDefinition:
Figure out refers to finding a solution or understanding a problem, usually through a process of examination, experimentation or analysis.

Diagnose is used in medical contexts to identify illnesses, whereas figure out is used in a variety of contexts to find solutions or understand problems.

Identify.wordDefinition:
Identify generally refers to the process of recognizing or naming something.

It can be used in a wide variety of contexts, from identifying a person or place to identifying a particular problem or issue that needs to be addressed.

Diagnose is used when talking about determining a medical condition, while identify is used when talking about recognizing or naming something in general.

Pinpoint.wordDefinition:
Pinpoint means to identify or locate something precisely.

It can be used in a variety of contexts, such as when a detective is trying to pinpoint the location of a suspect, or when a scientist is trying to pinpoint the cause of a particular phenomenon.

Diagnose is used when referring to medical conditions, while pinpoint can be used in a variety of contexts to describe the precise identification or location of something.

Recognize.wordDefinition:
Recognize means to identify someone or something based on previous knowledge or experience. This could be in many different contexts, like recognizing a friend's face, recognizing a song on the radio, or recognizing a pattern in a math problem.

Diagnose is used for identifying a medical issue, while recognize is used for identifying something based on past knowledge or experience.

videos.Text: So it would seem that all our various medical miracles can delay or prevent death but not reverse it. But that's not as simple as it sounds because constant advancements in technology and medicine have resulted in diagnoses such as coma, describing potentially reversible conditions,

videos.Text: For that matter, you can't see it either. I mean, what if you have an illness or an infection? How can the doctor diagnose you without being able to see the color change or inflammation? And what if everyone is permanently invisible? Well, think about how boring the world would be
videos.Title: If superpowers were...

videos.Text: Inhalers are known to be very effective, and have helped many people live better lives. Although we've come a long way in improving how we treat and diagnose asthma, we still don't know its exact causes. We currently believe that a combination of genetic and environmental factors
videos.Title: How does asthma work? -...

videos.Text: Taking aspirin, which thins the blood, and nitroglycerin, which opens up the artery, can help keep the heart attack from getting worse. In the emergency room, doctors can diagnose a heart attack. They commonly use an electrocardiogram to measure the heart's electrical activity

videos.Text: i counted steps i got a standing desk and i learned that my one hour of walking every day was as good for my head as it was for my body and finally life's too short to live without ice cream when i was first diagnosed i made a list of all my favorite foods
videos.Title: The psychological weight...

videos.Text: The causes are complex, and consequently, diagnosing and living with bipolar disorder is a challenge. Despite this, the disorder is controllable. Certain medications like lithium can help manage risky thoughts and behaviors by stabilizing moods.
videos.Title: What is bipolar...

videos.Text: My grandmother and the penguins, they are unafraid of challenges, you know, the interesting thing is that, well, when that big oil spill was happening and she was diagnosed cancer and we knew she was going to have four months.
videos.Title: How One Penguin Started...

videos.Text: I was in the hospital on life support with less than a two percent chance of living. It wasn't until days later as I lay in a coma that the doctors diagnosed me
videos.Title: Amy Purdy: Living beyond...

videos.Text: Despite advances in medicine, cancer remains one of the most frightening diagnoses patients can receive.
videos.Title: What is leukemia? -...

quotes.Text: The battle against cancer has made me strong. It's like winning a war! When I was diagnosed, I was told by doctors my kidney, liver and other organs could fail. It was tough. I didn't know if I could save my life. But I was positive, and because of that, the doctor told me that I would be a man who would never have cancer.
quotes.Title: Indian Athlete
quotes.Name: Yuvraj Singh

quotes.Text: I was diagnosed with OCD and depression, and that was a huge relief, because now my struggles had a name and could be reckoned with. With a combination of therapy and medication, I got better. I learned to love life again. My problems didn't go away, but they became much easier to face.
quotes.Title: American Actress
quotes.Name: Shannon Purser

quotes.Text: Anyone who thinks 'Modern Times' has got a big message is just putting it there himself. Charlie knew that the pressures of modern life and factory life would be good for a lot of laughs, and that's why he did the film - not because he wanted to diagnose the industrial revolution.
quotes.Title: English Actor
quotes.Name: Stan Laurel

quotes.Text: I was able to get operated on four days after I was diagnosed. It was just a matter of getting this baseball-sized tumor out of me. I reflect now on how lucky I was to be in the situation where I could get the best possible help and treatment.
quotes.Title: American Athlete
quotes.Name: Eric Davis

quotes.Text: My mom's best friend growing up was diagnosed with AIDS, and he basically raised me when my mom was launching her business. Although I didn't understand at the time what HIV or AIDS was, I knew that's what he passed away from.
quotes.Title: American Actress
quotes.Name: Solange Knowles

quotes.Text: I've always been aware of my health - when you are having to go on stage and perform, you need to be feeling good - but when I was diagnosed with a life-threatening illness, I became really, really conscious of my health.
quotes.Title: Musician
quotes.Name: Olivia Newton-John

quotes.Text: Good tests can help teachers determine how their students are performing and identify the areas in which their students need assistance. Like an X-ray, however, tests can diagnose, but they cannot cure.
quotes.Title: American Activist
quotes.Name: Randi Weingarten

quotes.Text: Vets do what doctors used to - diagnose the injury or the condition, patch it up as best they can and remind you that these things happen and that in life we are also in the midst of death.
quotes.Title: American Writer
quotes.Name: Jane Smiley

quotes.Text: The goal of NIH research is to acquire new knowledge to help prevent, detect, diagnose, and treat disease and disability, from the rarest genetic disorder to the common cold.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: Ike Skelton

quotes.Text: I've never said I have OCD, as I haven't been diagnosed.
quotes.Title: English Comedian
quotes.Name: Jon Richardson
